nodes.bodyText: Note, small simplification where this if statement was removed. If the target file DNE then we'll proceed to run gradle. Before we checked as well if the gradle output existed to skip the gradle run, instead now we'll just run gradle anyways.
Declare and assign separately to avoid masking return values.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+# Launches a local docker container that will have a PSQL DB on it.
+# Note, it takes a few seconds for database to initialize after running
+# this script. Once initializated then 'run_flyway' can be run to install
+# schema and tables.
+
+function stop_container() {
+  echo "Stopping docker..."
+  local runningContainerId=$(docker container ls | grep triplea-lobby-db | cut -f 1 -d ' ')
